name: The Island (itch) (Moonstone)
description:
THE ISLAND

THE AUDIO IS BROKEN AND I DONT KNOW WHY!!!!!!

https://beepbox.co/player/#song=8n31s0k1l00e0bt2mm0a7g0fj07i0r1o3210T0v1L4u12q1d...

HERE IS THE LINK TO THE AUDIO^^^^

This game was made in 72 hours for the Ben Bonk Game Jam!

The theme was Limited Space so I chose and island! The textures are all pixel art, giving me less space to create assets!

How to play:

  • W, A, S, D or arrow keys to move
  • left click to swing
  • Move around and try to kill the enemies and dong get to close!

I hope you guys enjoy this game! A lot of work went into this and a lot of scraped content! Have fun on The Island!
